description.value:
This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. It also has the following additional properties. When one of these properties is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

&Reference[lightning]{Lightning}. When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the target to take an extra 2d6 &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage.

&Reference[thunder]{Thunder}. When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the staff to emit a crack of &Reference[thunder]{thunder}, audible out to 300 feet. The target you hit must succeed on a [[/save con 17 format=long]] or become &Reference[stunned]{stunned} until the end of your next turn.

&Reference[lightning]{Lightning} Strike. You can use an action to cause a bolt of &Reference[lightning]{lightning} to leap from the staff's tip in a &Reference[line]{line} that is 5 feet wide and 120 feet long. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 17 format=long]], taking 9d6 &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Thunderclap. You can use an action to cause the staff to issue a deafening thunderclap, audible out to 600 feet. Each creature within 60 feet of you (not including you) must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]]. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d6 &Reference[thunder]{thunder} damage and becomes &Reference[deafened]{deafened} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't &Reference[deafened]{deafened}.

&Reference[thunder]{Thunder} and &Reference[lightning]{Lightning}. You can use an action to use the &Reference[lightning]{Lightning} Strike and Thunderclap properties at the same time. Doing so doesn't expend the daily use of those properties, only the use of this one.
